tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had a great experience throughout my RCT done at citrus dental. Dr Dimple is really professional and caring for her patients. Her knowledge and insights on dental care and overall hygiene was really an eye opener for me and would help me in the longer run. Staff is also well trained and humble. Do visit for general checkup/RCT/any other kind of issues. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Really professional team, had a seamless experience on straightening my teeth. Had to put on braces for less than a year. Thank you! for fixing my smile

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Dimple is exceptional. **** ************* *** ** ****** ** ********** She immediately put me at ease vis a vis my wisdom tooth pain. Explained that since the tooth has fractured it needs to be extracted. On my agreeing to the procedure the same was scheduled for next day and Dr. Kiran who performed the surgery was an exception too. Excellent surgeon. The procedure in total took 5 minutes to complete and the recovery has been swift and painless without any complications.
I thank Dr Kiran and Dr Dimple for taking  good care of me. May God bless them all..people in Varthur and nearby can awail the services of Dr Dimple without any reservations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dear Dr. Dimple, I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional work you performed during my recent root canal procedure. Your dedication, expertise, and skill during the treatment were truly remarkable.First and foremost, I would like to thank you for your patience and attentiveness throughout the entire procedure. Your ability to make me feel comfortable and at ease, despite my initial apprehension, is truly commendable.Additionally, your ********* ********* *** professionalism were evident throughout the process. You went above and beyond by thoroughly explaining each step of the procedure, addressing any concerns I had, and ensuring that I fully understood the treatment plan.Furthermore, the results of the root canal are outstanding. I am genuinely amazed at how well everything turned out. The level of precision and attention to detail you demonstrated has completely alleviated my prior discomfort, and I am grateful for the high standard of care you provided.I truly appreciate your exceptional work and the positive impact it has had on my oral health. You are an outstanding dentist, and I feel fortunate to have had you as my practitioner. Thank you once again for your dedication and for going above and beyond to provide me with such excellent care.Warm regards,Abu Abraham

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had been suffering from tooth ache past 3days so i booked the appointment from practo and visited "Citrus Dental"clinic .I met the staff (Arshita) and she was too friendly and humble, she asked my condition and offered me water. I hardly waited for few minutes and Dr.Dimple arrived. She too made me comfortable and was too friendly, asked all my situations and heard me carefully. After which she examined my mouth and tooth condition,using x-ray. She found out that my upper wisdom tooth was the culprit and was causing me unbearable pain. So she prescribed the medication and suggested to go for wisdom tooth extraction, she fixed the appointment with another surgeon for next the day. I visited again for the scheduled appointment and met Dr.Kiran. Even, Dr. Kiran was too humble,friendly , profesional and down to earth. I was afraid as I had no one to bring along with me but everyone made me so comfortable and friendly that i didn't needed anyone . I must say Dr. Dimple is not just an awesome dentist but a very humble soul too :) Even the staffs are too good and helpful:) It was an awesome experience and I would highly recommend Citrus Dental, Practo to the users. I wish all the best to Dr. Dimple and her staffs in making it big and last but not the least thanks a lot for fixing my issues üòá‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A wonderful RCT experience at Citrus Dental.I was having a partly broken tooth for sometime which was leading to uncomfortable touchpoints around the tooth and gum. I visited Citrus Dental to give it a go after doing some prelim research on web, the proximity was also a reason. However, after my first visit I was totally convinced about it. Inconsulted with Dr. Dimple who was really calm in hearing my problem before sharing her advise, along with different options to go forward along with their pro-cons. I was really impressed to hear this part, as now a days most clinics we hear about how the costliest one is more beneficial. Later on, i enrolled myself for a RCT (root canal) on doctors advice and based on my suitability doctor allocated me convenient appointment slots. I had a RCT experience previously, hence really loved the flexibility part as I had to get this done amid office trip and household chores. Later I also got cap done on my RCTed tooth, and even here her detailed consultation was very helpful (and educative on same time). Apart from visits, she was caring enough to check the condition of the treated tooth at regular interval, which is fantastic considering most places its like "visit us if any problem" approach. She is really considerate about others time, hence kind of always punctual on scheduled appointment timeframes, that helped greatly. Highly recommend her for any dental consultation or process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is friendly and efficient. Offers practical solutions.  Clinic staff is friendly and cooperative.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited citrus dental to get my daughter's cavity checked. At first my daughter was not ready to even enter the clinic , after talking with dr We returned back since my daughter was not ready to get the treatment. During our next visit Doctor did make my daughter comfortable and finally she was ready to get the treatment. The procedure was smooth üëå,  my daughter didn't even complain once during the course. We have been visiting Dr Bhatiya since past few months and my daughter loves going to citrus dental.  Can't thank dr Bhatiya enough for supporting us throughout the journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. The staff and Dr. Dimple G Bhatiya  ( BDS MUHS) were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how Dr. DImple really took her time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor‚Äôs demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this clinic. Citrus Dental. Further, to add I had also taken my father-in-law to the doctor for severe dental pain across 4 teeths, she had extracted the 3 teeth causing issue to the pain with ease, really happy with the way the things moved, highly recommended for the dental related issues. Now I think I really don‚Äôt have to wander here and there for dental issue as she is our family doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hey there everyone,
I am sharing my experience with Citrus dental here
1.First of all the location is perfect and the clinic is so accessible
2.The Clinic is well equipped and the facility is wonderfully clean.
3.I was referred to Dr.Dimple and she was very calm , warm in listening to my problem helping me heal
4.The nursing staff are very careful and courteous  to help you and address all your questions with a smile .
5.The appointment process was so easy, they also entertain walk ins that sounded very nice to me.
6.From implants to dental cleaning and extraction they perform everything

As they say a smile is equal to a thousand words.
If you want to smile right visit Citrus , you would be glad

review:
*** ****** ** ****** ************* *** thorough in terms of her diagnosis and in explaining the issue to the patients ******* ************* ************ ******** ********** ** ******** ********** 
Apart from the procedure, which was painless, the overall fee charged was also very justifiable and apt for the services provided. I went for basic cleaning of my teeth along with some yellowing of molars/worn down teeth which were later treated with dental fillings and that too without any pain or medication after the procedure.

Would recommend visiting this (Citrus Dental) clinic for any dental problems.

Thank you, doctor!
reply_text:
Thankyou for giving us the opportunity to serve you. We are elated by your experience with us. 
Regards.

review:
My nana was having pain in his tooth since some days(in October'20). It then became unbearable and I took him to Citrus Dental Care where Dr. Dimple Bhatiya examined him. Dr. Dimple made sure that she took utmost care and safety while treating my Nana(Since it was covid situation also). My nana had to undergo RC, so he was bit afraid but we were assured by Dr.Dimple and she stayed by her words !
Very professional, calm & good in her work, she completed the RC and finally my Nana was able to then eat without any pain. We are very thankful to such a polite Dr. Dimple and she is our family dentist now !!
Highly recommend Citrus Dental to everyone!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr.Dimple for my mother's treatment, she is a very professional and courteous doctor, she listens to patients carefully and takes time to understand the issue and provides a clear diagnosis with multiple treatment options to choose from.

She is very responsive and is always ready to answer questions on WhatsApp or Telegram. The clinic is clean and well maintained and on the ground floor providing ease of access especially for elder patients.

Overall an excellent experience consulting with Dr.Dimple, highly recommended for dental issues and procedures.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom (68 years) required an analysis of her dental cavities, along with root canal treatment, and repair of her teeth bridges.  

This treatment required multiple visits across a few weeks.  On the last day of the treatment (today), I recount an exceptional quality of service offered by Dr. Dimple and her able team (Dr. Shruthi and their assistant Ms. Anitha).  

Dr. Dimple paid a lot of attention to every step in the treatment process, ensuring the ease of the patient and clarifying every aspect of the treatment.  Along with this, Dr. Dimple ensured that we don't have to shell out any additional expense than what is really required.  This is an aspect I'd like to strongly appreciate & highlight here.  This is an aspect which is sadly very rare to find in today's times.

Apart from this, the entire team's passion, commitment, patient friendliness and dedication are exemplary!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dimple is very professional and expert in all types of Dental treatment. Recently I have taken Root canal treatment from her and it has been truly a great experience. Both the Doctor and her assistant has been very calm and polite during my entire treatment. For Root Canal generally it requires 3-4 visit with a gap of at least 1-2 days per visit so Dr. Dimple has always asked for my convenient date and time and has been very punctual. My wife has also taken her treatment in the past and Dr. Dimple has done an excellent job replacing her old fillings and improving her gums. I have complete confidence in her abilities to quickly perform only the work necessary and minimize all discomfort. My overall dental treatment has been very satisfying and I would definitely recommend everyone to consult with her for their all Dental problems!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Cavities,Post and Core,Dental Surgery,Dental Crowns,
review:
We approached Dr. Dimple just before 2nd lock down, for treating my broken tooth. Thanks for the immediate response and giving us the appointment. All necessary precautions are taken care in this Covid-19 pandemic, She explained all the possible treatments available for the problem and also explains PROS and corns in each process. In Multiple seating's, multiple doctors attend and all are guiding as similar to Dr. Dimple. All the time Clinic is clean and she maintains hygiene. We can trust her services related to any dental issues, Fee is also charged in normal price. We fully satisfied with her treatment, politeness, humble and way she taking care of her patients. Only one issue, i faced with her helper, she is bit in-experience(Hope she will also trained up slowly in next 2 or 3 months). 

Finally, we went to Dr. Dimple with broken tooth, We returned with artificial tooth, which looks like my original tooth

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
I had tooth pain so visited Citrus Dental . Root canal was performed . It was a pleasant experience. 
I had couple of fillings also done in my other teeth along with treating my bleeding gums issue . 
I highly recommend Citrus Dental and Dr. Dimple for being so patient n kind . Clinic doesn‚Äôt not have fancy 5 star hotel types interior , it‚Äôs simple and elegant with honest , ************* *** hardworking staff . This is my go-to place for any of my dental needs for me n my family. Highly recommend!!

The Dr Dimple Bhatiya is at home in her profession.She treats a patient like an own sister and daughter.Her nature is facile.Behaviour is police.Hands are perfect.*** *** ******* ********* ** ***********She is well trained to handle a patient mooly.I have a chance to get treatment from her for deep cavity ,root canal and calling one badlte affected teeth. I am perfect now.Treatment is also not costly with respect to other places like,Noida.
She has a broad opportunity available in her career.In her stratup of practice,she has done miraculous work.Ahead future is bright!I suggest the persons to available her services for teeth,jaw,etc as a qualified dentist including denturing.
The best wishes for her!üëç

review: It was an awesome experience. I went for my wisdom tooth extraction and it hardly took 15 min to get all procedure done. No pain at all and the doctor will make you feel comfortable all the time.  I‚Äôm glad I chose citrus Dental for my dental treatment. Highly recommended!

Excellent. Nicely explained the issue and treatment.Did proper check of all teeth and gum.Shared required things to maintain good oral health.Must visit place for any oral issue. Thank you Dr. Dimple.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As usual after a long search, based on google reviews i went to meet Dr. Dimple. I was having very bad tooth ache. RCT was performed. Trust me it was pain less. Explained the problem and solved it well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had severe pain in my lower wisdom tooth.  An immediate dental surgery was needed as tooth was not getting enough space to come out.  
Surgery was smooth and painless and even pain wasn‚Äôt there after the anaesthesia‚Äôs effect was gone.
So i had a overall very nice experience with this procedure and the doctor alsoüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Overall experience with my dental implant fix was amazing. Dimple is an amazing doctor and she manages overall clinic so well due to which I never had to wait for my appointments. And I am really happy with the implant. It feels so natural that it doesn't feel like implant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: II had a missing tooth. I used to feel very embarrassed. I had heard about Dr. Dimple through my family friend. I went to Citrus Dental. I got my tooth replaced by a dental bridge. Whole experience was seamless. Its my Go-To dental clinic now. Highly recommend Doc efforts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dimple is very friendly and experienced doctor. Unlike other doctors she does not exaggerate the issues and/or suggests unnecessary treatments. My parents got their dental fillings and root canal done at her clinic. My mother was too scared to visit a doctor but Dr. Dimple made her so comfortable and got the filling done without any hassle. Highly recommended to visit the clinic for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Dimple was very empathetic towards my moms special situation with her partial dentures. She provided all the necessary advice and also fixed my mom's broken dentures in very quick time and to our satisfaction. She was also very accomodative in providing appointment slots.

Dr.Dinple is also very reasonable with her pricing and has clearly explained the breakdown of the costs to us.

I strongly recommend Dr. Dimple for all your dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came here for my missing tooth consultation then doctor explained me about denture and I got fixed it I came here for 3 times  . the doctor and the staff are professional and main thing is clinic is clean and hygienic  I highly recommend citrus dental.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have went for sensitivity issues, but Dr.Dimple diagnosed the issue and did the relevant treatment with guiding on why the issue happened with out pain, and given proper guidance on how we have to take care so that we don't get dental issues.

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Citrus Dental for cavity treatment for my five year old daughter. Doctor attended our appointment schedule on time. Doctor was so friendly and explained the required treatment with reference to xray. Doctor recommended to just go for cement filling instead of root canal as the cavity is not too deep. entire process took about 30-40 min. I am so happy that my daughter didn't express and pain during or after the treatment. I strongly recommend Citrus Dental to everyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Dimple is very friendly in treating patients and explains the procedure well before starting the treatment. I have visted Citrus for scaling and dental filling and I am completely satisfied with the treatment. Even the root canal treatment for my husband is done by her around 6 months back wonderfully..Appointment time was given prior which reduced our waiting time..Overall wonderful Dentist near to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Dimple is very professional and she treats the patients with utmost care and affection. We had an amazing experience at her clinic and i am fully satisfied with the RCT treatment she has done. 
Will recommend others to definitely visit the doctor for any dental issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Bhatia is very friendly and take pains to explain the problem and solution in detail
The best part is that she don't treat if treatment is not required
I went for my son and one of the other doctors recommended tooth extraction but Dr Bhatia was of opinion that nothing needed and we went with her opinion and everything went fine
I also got denture for my father and it was perfect.
I would highly recommend her especially for sticking to given appointment time and skill set

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review: I had gone for my teeth cleaning. Got few fillings and root canal treatment done. It was painless. I highly recommend the clinic. I have also taken appointment for my parents and siblings. It's my go to family dental clinic. Neat, tidy, disciplined culture. Highly appreciate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This is a great place to go take care of your teeth. Doctor was very professional examining and providing with solutions by priority. I had to do cleaning and filling etc and Dr. Dimple did a great job, I felt that I was in good hands. She is very gentle and kind to me. She explained very well what was going on. Thanks to Dr.Dimple!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Like most people, I am nervous about a visit to the dentist but Dr Bhatiya is so good, she put me at total ease almost immediately. After an examination, it turned out that all I needed was a dental cleaning and that procedure was also performed with patience, understanding and total efficiency.

10/10 would recommend Dr Bhatiya to anyone. I, for on, cannot imagine visiting any other Dentist.

Thank you for making my smile that much brighter, Dr Bhatiya!

review:
